value:
$WmMPID_ミシェイル,ch01_22_Misheil_M_Normal,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_幼少ミネルバ,ch01_21_Minerba_F_Before01,Face|Brother!$k$p$WmMPID_ミシェイル,ch01_22_Misheil_M_Normal,Face|Minerva?$k$pNo. You're...younger. A Minerva
from an earlier time than I.$k$p$WmMPID_幼少ミネルバ,ch01_21_Minerba_F_Before01,Face|Then, that makes you...a version
of my brother from my future.$k$pYes, I see it now. Your maturity, your
strength...all befitting a king of
Macedon. Truly you are Iote reborn!$k$p$WmMPID_ミシェイル,ch01_22_Misheil_M_Normal,Face|Enough.$k$p$WmMPID_幼少ミネルバ,ch01_21_Minerba_F_Before01,Face|Have I...somehow given offense?$k$p$WmMPID_ミシェイル,ch01_22_Misheil_M_Normal,Face|Indeed you have. Your empty
platitudes make me sick.
You disgust me.$k$p$WmMPID_幼少ミネルバ,ch01_21_Minerba_F_Before01,Face|How can you say such things?
And with such hatred in your eyes...$k$p$WmMPID_ミシェイル,ch01_22_Misheil_M_Normal,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_幼少ミネルバ,ch01_21_Minerba_F_Before01,Face|The brother I know is firm, but there
is care in his eyes...eyes that shine
with hope for Macedon's future.$k$pWhat could have transpired between
my time and yours to change him so?$k$pWhat darkness does my future hold?!$k$p$WmMPID_ミシェイル,ch01_22_Misheil_M_Normal,Face|This is fruitless.$k$p$WmMPID_幼少ミネルバ,ch01_21_Minerba_F_Before01,Face|Stop! You can't simply leave me here!
Please, tell me!$k$p$WmMPID_ミシェイル,ch01_22_Misheil_M_Normal,Face|You truly wish to know? Fine.$k$pI murdered our father. I may as well
have killed you too.$k$pNow, unless you'd like to meet such
a fate early...I suggest you leave me.$k$p$WmMPID_幼少ミネルバ,ch01_21_Minerba_F_Before01,Face|Brother...$k$p$WmMPID_ミシェイル,ch01_22_Misheil_M_Normal,Face|I am not your brother.
Get out of my sight.$k$p

$WmMPID_ミシェイル,ch01_22_Misheil_M_Normal,Face|Defeated, but...$k$pPerhaps free from this curse...at last...$k$p$WmMPID_幼少ミネルバ,ch01_21_Minerba_F_Before01,Face|Brother...$k$p$WmMPID_ミシェイル,ch01_22_Misheil_M_Normal,Face|I told you before, Minerva... I am no
brother of yours. Not anymore...$k$p$WmMPID_幼少ミネルバ,ch01_21_Minerba_F_Before01,Face|But you are! The brother I love yet
lives, even buried underneath that
hard exterior. I know it.$k$pYou were harsh when last we met,
but I understand now you were only
trying to warn me.$k$pAnd in this battle, you held back.
You sacrificed yourself to ensure
victory...for me.$k$p$WmMPID_ミシェイル,ch01_22_Misheil_M_Normal,Face|Ridiculous...$k$p$WmMPID_幼少ミネルバ,ch01_21_Minerba_F_Before01,Face|You told me that you murdered
Father. You said that you may as well
have killed me.$k$pPerhaps we are indeed on that path
right now.$k$p$WmMPID_ミシェイル,ch01_22_Misheil_M_Normal,Face|We are.$k$p$WmMPID_幼少ミネルバ,ch01_21_Minerba_F_Before01,Face|Yet it does not have to be so! We
may have another future—instead of
or even beyond that one!$k$pWe may yet make peace with
one another!$k$p$WmMPID_ミシェイル,ch01_22_Misheil_M_Normal,Face|Perhaps... Impossible to say.$k$pBut if that is what you believe...
There is only one way to find out.$k$pYou will have to work toward that
future. To see it for yourself.$k$pFor me, there is no more hope...$k$p$WmMPID_幼少ミネルバ,ch01_21_Minerba_F_Before01,Face|Brother...$k$p
